panels.description: Note that this table shows the average values for the entire period selected in the dashboard. Consequently, it may contain information about Pods or namespaces that were changed or deleted during the selected period.

targets.expr: max by (namespace) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))

100 * count by (namespace) (
  sum by (namespace, verticalpodautoscaler) (  
    count by (namespace, controller_name, verticalpodautoscaler) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
    / on (controller_name, namespace) group_left
    count by (namespace, controller_name) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
  )
) 
/ count by (namespace) (sum by (namespace, controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
or
count(avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace)
  (
    (
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
      -
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
    ) > 0
  )
or count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace)
  (
    (
      (
        sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
        -
        sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
      ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
    )
    > 0
  )
or count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

(sum by (namespace) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) / sum by (namespace) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))) * sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"})
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
or
count(avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace)
  (
    (
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
      -
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
    ) > 0
  )
or
count(avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace)
  (
    (
      (
        sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
        -
        sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
      ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
    )
    > 0
  )
or count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) 
- 
(
  sum by (namespace) (
    sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
    *  
    sum by (namespace, pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="true",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
  )
)
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) 
- 
(
  sum by (namespace) (
    sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
    *  
    sum by (namespace, pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="true",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
  )
)
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

sum by (namespace) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 0

panels.title: Average

panels.description: The number of Pods in each namespace

targets.expr: count by (namespace) (max_over_time(kube_pod_info{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Pods count

targets.expr: sum by (namespace) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (namespace) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: This graph shows the requested CPU resources higher than the actual CPU consumption. In other words, it shows CPU resources that can be "freed" without affecting the service.

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace)
  (
    (
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
      -
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    ) > 0
  )

panels.title: Over-requested by namespace

panels.description: This graph shows the requested CPU resources lower than the actual CPU consumption. In other words, it shows CPU resources that need to be "reserved" for the service to run smoothly.

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace)
  (
    (
      (
        sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
        -
        sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
      ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    )
    > 0
  )

panels.title: Under-requested by namespace

panels.description: The absence of data on the graph means that container resources are not set

targets.expr: sum by (namespace) ((sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))) * sum by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}))

panels.title: Throttling

targets.expr: sum by (namespace) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])* on (uid) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})

sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])* on (uid) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"})
sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum by (namespace) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (namespace) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: $namespace

targets.expr: sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: The Working set bytes metric is the actual memory used by the container, as it includes active file memory. When its value approaches the limit, the container can be killed by the OOMKiller. This value can be higher than the sum RSS and Cache since not all active file memory is Cache.

targets.expr: sum (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (avg_over_time(container_memory_swap{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (avg_over_time(container_memory:kmem{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: This graph shows the requested Memory resources higher than the actual Memory consumption. In other words, it shows Memory resources that can be "freed" without affecting the service.

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace)
  (
    (
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
      -
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    ) > 0
  )

panels.title: Over-requested by namespace

panels.description: This graph shows the requested Memory resources higher than the actual Memory consumption. In other words, it shows Memory resources that need to be "reserved" for the service to run smoothly.

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace)
  (
    (
      (
        sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
        -
        sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
      ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    )
    > 0
  )

panels.title: Under-requested by namespace

panels.description: The Working set bytes metric is the actual memory used by the container, as it includes active file memory. When its value approaches the limit, the container can be killed by the OOMKiller. This value can be higher than the sum RSS and Cache since not all active file memory is Cache.

targets.expr: sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(container_memory_swap{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(namespace) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{container!="POD",namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(namespace) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(namespace) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (namespace) (avg_over_time(container_memory:kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: $namespace

panels.description: This graph shows Network Receive (except for the hostNetwork Pods)

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) 
- 
(
  sum by (namespace) (
    sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    *  
    sum by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_info{host_network="true",namespace=~"$namespace"})
  )
)

panels.title: Receive

panels.description: This graph shows Network Transmit (except for the hostNetwork Pods)

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) 
- 
(
  sum by (namespace) (
    sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    *  
    sum by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_info{host_network="true",namespace=~"$namespace"})
  )
)

panels.title: Transmit

targets.expr: sum by (namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (namespace) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
(sum by (namespace) (
  (
    sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node"})
    * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim)
    sum by (namespace, persistentvolume, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
        + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
    )
  )
  or on(namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    sum by (persistentvolume) (
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$__rate_interval])
    )
    * on(persistentvolume) group_left(namespace, persistentvolumeclaim)
    sum by (namespace, persistentvolume, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
        + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
    )
  )
) and on (namespace) (kube_namespace_created * scalar(count (kube_node_info) == bool count (kube_node_info{node=~"$node"})) > 0))
or sum by (namespace) (
    sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node"})
    * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim)
    sum by (namespace, persistentvolume, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
        + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
    )
)

panels.title: PVC Provisioned (except local storage classes)

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace) (
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
  * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left(persistentvolume)
	sum by (namespace, persistentvolume, persistentvolumeclaim) (
		label_replace(
			max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
			"persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
			+ on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
	)
)

panels.title: PVC Used (except local storage classes)

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace) (
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
  * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim)
	sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
		label_replace(
			max_over_time(
				kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
				"persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
				+ on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
	)
)
/
sum by (namespace) (
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
  * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim)
	sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
		label_replace(
			max_over_time(
				kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
				"persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
				+ on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
	)
)

panels.title: PVC Used in % (except local storage classes)
